TEXT.S: Vietnam hya' ga cyux maki' tay 16 10 N, 107 50 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 331,210 sq km (maki' tay 66ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 310,070 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 21,140 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 95,261,021. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga34.80 , lhlahuy hya' ga 45 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 20.20 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Hanoi. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 2 na tay mqiru' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Tr n i Quang, aring ryax 2 squ byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2016 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
